segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at the absurdity of this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, and the kids are sneaking cookies right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a circus act, and his sister is just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the stool will tip first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter by the second, and the woman doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are so sneaky, and it’s kind of impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a funny, chaotic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I had a camera to capture this.
segments.speaker: PAR
